title: Parameters for Crop Box Filter Node

min_x.description: minimum x-coordinate value for crop range in meters

min_y.description: minimum y-coordinate value for crop range in meters

min_z.description: minimum z-coordinate value for crop range in meters

max_x.description: maximum x-coordinate value for crop range in meters

max_y.description: maximum y-coordinate value for crop range in meters

max_z.description: maximum z-coordinate value for crop range in meters

negative.description: if true, remove points within the box from the pointcloud; otherwise, remove points outside the box.
